faqs.question: Yini i-TaxEasy_ZA?
faqs.answer: I-TaxEasy_ZA yisixhobo esisimahla esikunceda ukubala irhafu yengeniso yaseNingizimu Afrika. Ikusiza ukuqikelela inhlawulo yakho yerhafu futhi uqonde izaphulelo ezingokufanele.

faqs.question: Ingabe idatha yami ibukelwe?
faqs.answer: Yebo, i-TaxEasy_ZA ihlonipha umthetho we-POPIA futhi ayigcini noma ayikolobi idatha yakho yomuntu. Zonke izibalo zenziwa kuphela kumakhalekhukhwini akho.

faqs.question: Ihlela unyaka luni werhafu?
faqs.answer: Le khalukuletha ihlela unyaka werhafu ka-2025 (1 Mashi 2024 â€“ 28 Febhuwari 2025) egcinelwe amatiphu namasu e-SARS okwamanje.

faqs.question: Yiziphi i-IRP5 codes futhi ngazithola kuphi?
faqs.answer: Lezi zinkomba ezisemthethweni ezihlela uhlobo lwezimali nezaphulelo. Zitholakala kusetifiketi sakho se-IRP5 esinikezwa umqondisi wakho.

faqs.question: I-medical aid tax credits iyasebenza kanjani?
faqs.answer: Kwezi kredithi zanyanga eziwenza inhlawulo yakho yethafa inciphise. Ngo-2025: R347 ngenyanga kumeluleki wokuqala nowokuqandayo, R234 kulabo okuqashwa abalandelayo.

faqs.question: Umkhawulo wemali ethunyelwayo ematikiseni wokugera nini?
faqs.answer: Ungakhupha kufinyelela ku-27.5% yemali yakho ephethelelayo noma yokulethwa yirhafu, ube ngumkhawulo we-R350,000 ngonyaka.

faqs.question: I-travel allowance ithathwa kanjani irhafu?
faqs.answer: Ithathwa irhafu ngokuphelele (ikhodi 3701). Nokho, ungacela izindleko zokuhamba kweshishini uma ubhalela incwadi yokuhamba.

faqs.question: Ngingacela izindleko ze-ofisi yasekhaya?
faqs.answer: Yebo, uma usenze umsebenzi wakho ekhaya noma uphatha ibhizinisi lapho. Le nkontsho ibalwa ngokwesibili somkhathazo wendawo esetshenziswa kuphela ngezinjongo zeshishini.

faqs.question: Zikhona izaphulelo zikagesi olusolwa yilanga?
faqs.answer: Yebo, isigaba 12B sivumela ukukhuphwa okungu-100% kwezinhlanhla zikagesi elisetshenziswa ukufudumeza amanzi neziphaneli ze-PV unyaka ozifakelwe wona.

faqs.question: Imali yokuqasha ithathwa kanjani irhafu?
faqs.answer: Ithathwa irhafu ngokuphelele, kodwa ungakhupha izindleko ezifana nenzala yebhondi, ama-rates, inshurensi, ukulungiswa kanye nokuwehla kwexabiso (5% ngonyaka).

faqs.question: Kukhona ukukhululwa kwenzala?
faqs.answer: Yebo, ngo-2025: R23,800 ngonyaka kubantu abangaphansi kuka-65, R34,500 kubantu abangama-65 noma ngaphezulu.

faqs.question: Ngabe izabelo azithathi irhafu?
faqs.answer: Izabelo zendawo zinokukhululwa lwangaphakathi kuka-R30,000 ngonyaka. Okwedlule lokho kuthathwa irhafu ye-20%.

faqs.question: Ngingacela imirhumo yobungcweti?
faqs.answer: Yebo, imirhumo yobungcweti kanye ne-CPD ziyakhuphwa ngaphansi kwesigaba 11(a) uma zihambisana nemisebenzi yakho.

faqs.question: Umkhawulo wemali enikelwayo yokuzekela yini?
faqs.answer: Imali enikelwa izinhlangothi eziqinisekiswa yi-SARS (isigaba 18A) iyakhuphwa kufinyelela ku-10% yemali yakho ephathelene nerhafu.

faqs.question: Izaphulelo ezihlobene neminyaka zisebenza kanjani?
faqs.answer: Ngo-2025: Isaphulelo sokuqala R17,235 (yonke iminyaka), sesibili R9,444 (65+), sesithathu R3,145 (75+). Zona zikhupha inhlawulo yakho ngokuthe ngqo.
